DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 6 Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of initiation of pharyngeal swallow in the oral impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Oral Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's initiation of pharyngeal swallow.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Oral Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's initiation of pharyngeal swallow.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's initiation of pharyngeal swallow.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No visible initiation at any location

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No visible initiation at any location
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no visible initiation of pharyngeal swallow at any location.

Concepts.longName: No Visible Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow at Any Location
Concepts.definition: A finding of no visible initiation of pharyngeal swallow at any location.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head in pyriforms.

Concepts.longName: Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow with Bolus Head in Pyriform Sinus
Concepts.definition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head in the pyriform sinus.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Bolus head at posterior laryngeal surface of epiglottis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Bolus head at posterior laryngeal surface of epiglottis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head at posterior laryngeal surface of epiglottis.

Concepts.longName: Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow with Bolus Head at Posterior Laryngeal Surface of Epiglottis
Concepts.definition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head at posterior laryngeal surface of epiglottis.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head in valleculae.

Concepts.longName: Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow with Bolus Head in Valleculae
Concepts.definition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head in valleculae.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Bolus head at posterior angle of ramus (first hyoid excursion)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Bolus head at posterior angle of ramus (first hyoid excursion)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head at posterior angle of ramus.

Concepts.longName: Initiation of Pharyngeal Swallow with Bolus Head at Posterior Angle of Ramus
Concepts.definition: A finding of pharyngeal swallow initiated with bolus head at posterior angle of ramus.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
